titleStmt.title: A copie of Collnel Massey's letter: of all the particulars of the great fight betweene him, and Prince Rupert, at Ledbury on Wednesday the 22.th of Aprill, 1645. With the number and names of the chiefe of those that were killed, and taken on both sides. As also the taking of 10 peece of ordnance by Collonel Massey at Lydney. Die Jovis Maii, 1. 1645. Commanded to be printed, and is published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Massey, Edward, Sir, 1619?-1674?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
